posts.post_content:
Here is a consolidated and updated thread of t206s for sale - please add $4 for shipping. Apologies for the frequent bumps. 

I am currently looking for rarebacks of HOFers, Cubs, Giants, Highlanders etc. I’ll practically look at anything though so fire away. Will try to trade these before considering selling outright. As always offers are welcome
